item.description:
Hello Newcomers,

I've been living in Providence for the past four years, but unfortunately my time here has to come to an end. I'll be going back to Smith College this summer to take courses, then moving to New Haven to do an internship at Yale Psychiatric Hospital for 9 months, and then back to Smith next summer! Who knows where life will take me after that?!

I've been planning Newcomers events for the past three years and this group is so special to me. I've met some truly awesome people, and appreciate each member for contributing to my Providence experience.

I hope you are able to come out for my very last event, a downtown bar "exploration", whether it's to say goodbye to me or to come to your very first Newcomers event! Everyone is welcomed!

The "itinerary" will be e-mailed out to all "Yes" RSVPs the Friday morning of the event. Feel free to drop-in or drop-out whenever you please.

Hope to see you there.

xoxo,

Malyna
item.name: Downtown Bar
